General.Name: iMetal Resources Inc
General.Description: iMetal Resources Inc., a junior exploration company, focuses on the acquisition, exploration, development, and evaluation of resource properties in Ontario and Quebec in Canada. The company explores for precious and base metal resources. Its flagship property is the Gowganda West project covering an area of approximately 150 squares kilometers located in Ontario. The company was formerly known as Adroit Resources Inc. and changed its name to iMetal Resources Inc. in November 2015. iMetal Resources Inc. is headquartered in Vancouver, Canada.
General.Address: 800 West Pender Street, Vancouver, BC, Canada, V6C 2V6
